inlineContent.text: Safari 17 is available for iOS 17, iPadOS 17, macOS Sonoma, macOS Ventura, and macOS Monterey.

to set the active cell within a grid.
Fixed the wrong role displayed for
Fixed VoiceOver when selecting “Sign in with Apple” on some websites.
attribute to expose expanded state to assistive technologies.
Fixed some inputs not being treated as invalid despite being rendered as such.
Fixed form controls taking the accessibility text of an ancestor label over their own inner text.
Fixed VoiceOver not reading entered text in text fields.
Fixed labels for slot elements referenced with

Fixed computing the accessible name for
elements that rely on labels or captions.
Fixed slotted elements not being exposed to accessibility when inside
lists to return the correct sub-role.
Fixed some content on web pages not displaying on braille displays.
Fixed table structure for elements with a
Fixed: Improved accessibility for tables and table components with
Fixed unexpected speech synthesis behavior for unordered lists.
Added support for Apple Pay in cross-origin iframes with the
Fixed repaint issue when drawing VideoFrames to canvas.
Added support for optional resolution and type arguments in
Added support for the two-value syntax of
white-space to the User-Agent Stylesheet for the
in HTML missing quote marks getting mistakenly hidden from the Preload Scanner.
Fixed matching elements without a parent with the child-indexed pseudo-class.

Fixed font variations for some fonts declared with CSS
Fixed applying certain user-agent styles to HTML elements, and not elements with other namespaces.

content attribute from the document element.
Fixed respecting style containment on list items.
Fixed scrollbar to correctly pick up changed styles immediately.
Fixed negative resolutions in Media Queries to be invalid.
to stop propagating underlines to align with other browsers.
Fixed container units in a container query to evaluate against the ancestor container.
Fixed cursor style to respect explicitly set cursor type over system default.
Fixed container units to consider writing mode for unit resolution.
with left and right padding causes unexpected wrapping of inline content.
Redesigned the Develop menu, including device and application icons for connected devices.
Added the ability to open the current page in a Simulator from Responsive Design Mode or the Develop menu.
Added Developer settings and Feature Flags to Safari settings.
Added support for pairing with tvOS and visionOS on macOS Sonoma.
Fixed XML serialization to serialize implicit
attributes first and use lowercase “ns” when generating prefixes.
Improved interoperability for the Range API and Selection API.
Added a new appearance for marked text.
Added support for the caret color to match the accent color of the system on macOS.
Fixed returning live range synchronized with selection from
Fixed selection API to work across shadow boundaries.
Fixed webpage issues when translating to or from Ukranian.
Fixed showing the software keyboard when programatically focusing a text field during a double-click event.
when the root editable element is phrasing content.
Fixed “insertLineBreak” sometimes inserting a non-breaking space instead of a new line.
Fixed an issue when breaking out of an empty list item in case of nested lists.
. On macOS this is rendered as a separator.
Fixed CSS color getting adjusted for disabled input elements.
for partially completed dates and times.
Fixed conditional passkey request presenting a conditional control even after
attribute treating emoji of string length 11 as length 1.
setter to use a limit of 100,000.
Fixed reseting selection when changing multiple
Fixed selecting text within a label element that is linked to an input field.
Fixed HTMLOptionElement text setter to not throw an exception.
Fixed change event not firing when the user reverts the value of a color, date, or time input after JavaScript changed the value.
Fixed handling unclosed parenthese at the end of the
Fixed the HTMLPreloadScanner to not preload scripts with unsupported types.
Fixed popover incorrectly auto-hiding when using shadow DOM.
Added support for preconnect via HTTP early hints.
Fixed respecting Content-Type header for MIME type determination.
Fixed a bug with empty header values in Headers objects with “request-no-cors” guard.
Fixed Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy incorrectly blocking an iframe on a cache hit.
Added support for RegExp duplicate named capture groups.
to replace info getters with individual
Fixed: Improved RegExp lookbehind character class backtracking.
to support out-of-bounds handling in DFG.
Added support for vertical text recognition in images and videos.
Disabled the File API and FileReader API.
Added support for select web fonts.
Added Lockdown Mode support to WebKit on watchOS.
Added support for Managed Media Source on macOS and iPadOS, and added support as a preview on iOS.
Added support for AV1 codec support to the MediaCapabilities API for devices with hardware support.
Added support for enforcing low-power mode and optimize video streaming setting by tone mapping HDR video to SDR.
Added “Show Media Stats” when developer features are enabled in Safari.
Added support for making Managed Media Source available only when an AirPlay source alternative is present or remote playback is explicitly disabled.
for software codecs, including parsing and error handling.
Added support for stereo-only Opus in MPEG-4 and WebM containers on macOS Sonoma.
CSS added to audio controls when the height of an
Fixed sound echos in higher speed video playback.
event to fire whenever an eviction occurs.
Fixed MediaSource duration change algorithm to correctly update the duration.
Fixed video playback failure for content that uses the prefixed WebKit EME APIs.
Fixed video playback in Safari unexpectedly interrupting other apps playing audio.
Fixed MediaRecorder producing empty chunks when attaching a MediaStream before the context in a canvas is created.
Fixed muting capture in all other tabs when Safari starts camera and/or microphone capture in a tab.
Added blocking for known trackers and fingerprinting.
Added support for mitigating trackers that map subdomains to third-party IP addresses.
Added blocking for known tracking query parameters in links in Private Browsing.
Added noise to fingerprintable web APIs.
Added console log messages when blocking requests to known trackers.
Added support for blocking trackers that use third-party CNAME cloaking.
Added support for Private Click Measurement.
Added support for enabling Safari Extensions per-profile.
Added support for Web Push subscriptions per profile.
incorrectly truncating text in right-to-left mode.
Fixed text not getting truncated properly in vertical writing mode when
Fixed CSS flexbox to use initial scroll position when computing the baseline.
Fixed statically positioned out-of-flow box location when display type changes from
marker maintain the same margin in right-to-left as in left-to-right.
Fixed table with fixed layout behaving like auto layout when its width is set by JavaScript instead of CSS.
Fixed margins incorrectly accounting for before forced breaks in multi-column layout.
Fixed self-collapsing children with an incorrect top offset at the end of a block container with
Fixed a flash of mis-styled content due to a mechanism to block painting on a non-final style.
Fixed text wrapping in a nested grid layout.
Fixed repaint issue when adding text to a text box.
Fixed incorrect out-of-flow box placement for
Fixed incorrect out-of-flow box placement for
Fixed incorrect out-of-flow box placement for
content when a float is present.
Fixed repainting newly position float boxes.
Fixed out-of-flow inline content with a float and
Fixed gradient object generation to be thread-safe.
to not affect the enclosing height.
Fixed incorrect decorating box position in vertical writing mode.
Fixed incorrect vertical positioning when an ideographic baseline is present.
Fixed missing underline after the first character in
Fixed rendering a checkbox in a flexbox layout.
Fixed content getting truncated too early due to subpixel flooring.
Fixed overlapping list items when content has
text rendering horizontally in vertical writing mode.
Fixed complex text paths to not render visible tab glyphs.
when an intrusive float is present.
Fixed fragmentation of content with non-visible overflow when printing.
Fixed incorrectly including the scrollbar thickness in the logical height of a textarea with
attribute on table elements to not create a visible border.
Fixed inline-level elements with a self-painting layer rendering overlapping ellipsis.
Fixed list alignment when a list item has a flex container.
Fixed canvas not showing the results of
Added support for turning on or off extensions and content blockers in Private Browsing mode.
Added support for per-site permissions for Safari App Extensions.
Added support for syncing the state of Safari App Extensions across multiple macOS devices.
Added support for showing Content Blockers, the “On Other Devices” section, and a link to the App Store in the Manage Extensions view.
Fixed the script API not returning a result when the
Fixed WebNavigation events to no longer fire for webpages where the extension hasn’t been granted access.
Added complete support for the Storage API.
Added support for calculating quota based on disk space.
Fixed removing HTTP credentials when the data store is removed.
Fixed references for SVG fragments in shadow DOM trees.
having no effect on the dimension of a
element unless its dimensions are specified.
Fixed mixed characters in right-to-left mode for SVG text.
Fixed marker properties to allow any URI.
Fixed text transformation not starting on initial render.
Fixed nested use of the same SVG resource.
Fixed to not create an interval if a value in
doesn’t have a matching value in
Fixed the mapping from a point to a character index for the SVG
Fixed handling of a negative radius for
not getting applied when the width is
Fixed computing the percentage height of table cell children by removing the height of a horizontal scrollbar.
Fixed percentage sizing of table cell replaced children with a scrollbar.
Fixed logic to recompute keyframe styles to tie a change in computed keyframes on an accelerated animation while animating.
to distinguish matching any CSS property or Animation object.
Fixed keyframes to be recomputed when
Fixed the composite operation of implicit keyframes for CSS Animations to be “replace”.
Fixed keyframes to be recomputed when a parent element changes value for a custom property set to
to parse as a keyword, not a CSS property.
Added support for 3D OffscreenCanvas WebGL support.
support for SVGImageElement as an image source.
Added support for using relative URLs in the WebSocket constructor and HTTP(S) schemes.
Added experimental support for priority to CSS Highlight API.
Fixed Canvas context allocation failures due to exceeding the maximum canvas memory limit.
event when a modifier key is pressed.
Fixed string serialization of functions to match other browsers.
reporting the incorrect value on iOS.
Fixed: Improved GamePad compatibility with XBOX Cloud.
Fixed the Content-Type for sliced blobs in
to include padding and any whitespace added by decorations.
Fixed Range APIs to construct and move trees in tree order.
Fixed handling magnitude values passed to
to throw a SyntaxError on a URL parser failure.
Fixed the natural screen orientation on iPad and TV to be landscape-primary.
serialization to not have special handling for
Fixed CacheStorageManager creating a “salt” file in the current working directory when there is no path.
Fixed to no longer recognize the SVG
Fixed Non-UTF-8 encoders to correctly emit the U+FFFD code point instead of surrogate code points.
to no longer return any elements.
URLs to behave the same everywhere.
Fixed Wake Lock permission denied after
Fixed node depth computation for shadow nodes in ResizeObserver.
Fixed remaining page height to never be 0.
not updating a child element matching the
Fixed: Set canvas-based VideoFrame color space to RGB.
to fire abort events on XMLHttpRequest asynchronously.
Fixed selecting an OptGroup label not unselecting the selected item.
with multiple enabled not consistently firing the
Fixed style invalidation of IDs within
Fixed MediaStream from a canvas (captureStream) to be able to render into a different canvas.
Fixed window named getter to behave correctly when there are duplicate frame names.
Fixed Service Worker redirect losing the hash fragment.
Fixed camera RAW files picked via file input getting returned as PNG on change.
Fixed emoji characters sometimes getting incorrectly drawn in text style.
as if it has no end tag.
Removed deprecated uppercase URL attribute alias on the WebSocket interface.

Added support for web apps on macOS Sonoma. Add any website to the Dock from the File menu or Share Sheet to get to them even faster. Web apps open in their own window, and integrate with system features like Stage Manager, Screen Time, Notifications, and Focus.
Fixed: Started using origin directory for DOMCache and ServiceWorkerRegistrations.
Fixed Notifications API to default silent to the platform convention.
Fixed Web Push notifications not working in some cases by running the service worker before firing the
Fixed service worker downloads failing when chunks are sent via
event when a service worker gets deleted.
Added pretty-printing support for various modern JavaScript syntax, including optional chaining, private class members, and optional assignment operators.
Added support for showing grid and flex overlays when in element selection mode.
Added the Color Scheme toggle to user preferences overrides popover.
Added support for showing rulers when highlighting elements in element selection mode.
Added editing controls for variation axes in the Fonts sidebar of the Elements tab.
Added support for ES2022 Private Fields when inspecting and logging JavaScript objects.
Added support for viewing the target of a
Fixed removing a CSS declaration when tabbing though the CSS selector in the Styles panel.
Fixed Step Over behaving like Resume when stepping over a function with a falsy conditional breakpoint in the Sources tab.
Fixed the box model to indicate a margin has been trimmed with
Fixed “Inspect Element” not highlighting the selected element.
CSS in the Styles sidebar of the Elements tab.
Fixed failing to add a new CSS rule on the first attempt in the Elements tab.
Fixed Web Inspector to not show the accessibility role in hover tooltips for elements where accessibility is ignored.
Fixed missing console logging that occurs during main frame navigation in the Console tab.
Fixed cleared items in the Network tab reappearing when Preserve Log is enabled.
Fixed incorrect timestamps in the Console tab.
Fixed non-enumerable properties appearing as though they are internal properties in the Console tab.
Fixed internal properties not greyed-out in object previews in the Console tab.
Fixed private symbols to be omitted in the scope chain.
Fixed an issue where the width of the Sources details sidebar would reset when switching between Web Inspector tabs
Fixed editing for Local Storage that appears truncated.
Fixed the resource type shown in the Network tab to use XHR when the XHR request has the same URL as the main resource.
Fixed color swatch to not show an incorrect tooltip when read-only.
Fixed firing the context lost event for OffscreenCanvas.
Fixed OffscreenCanvas to work as a TexImageSource in WebGL.
Fixed preventing the display from going to sleep when the camera is on.
Fixed layer context handling for the HTMLMediaElement.
Fixed ending a muted microphone track when its device disappears.
Fixed camera selection to use the system preferred camera on iOS.
Fixed camera and microphone to all have
Added support for trying HTTPS for all navigations.
Added support for the Proxy API.
Added support for inline predictions for autocomplete.

abstract.text: Learn about changes for Safari for iOS and macOS, Web Inspector, WebKit view for iOS and macOS, and Safari view for iOS.
